item.description:
Marion Meadows - Contemporary Jazz/R&B

3:44-

Looks like they intend to go forward with the concert at this time, I will be down there if anyone wants to brave it and join me.  I have listed the Branford Jazz website below if you wish to check on the status on your own.

FREE

The Branford Jazz on the Green Series is pleased to announced that we are again back for NINE Thursday nights in row beginning Thursday night, June 30 at 6:30pm and concluding on Thursday night, August 25.

We have some of the best jazz musicians on the planet all coming to the Branford Green this summer so keep listening to Blue Plate Radio for the latest information and further announcements or sign up for the Blue Plate Radio newsletter for photos, reviews, and a whole lot more!  CD's and DVD's from many of the artists will be available for sale and autographs this summer too!

The Branford Jazz on the Green Series ... It's HOT!  It's SMOOTH!  It's COOOL!

No alcohol,no dogs.

http://www.branfordjazz.com/pdfs/2011_Branford_Jazz_Program.pdf

 

 

Marion Meadows

Contemporary jazz-styled soprano saxophonist Marion Meadows was born in West Virginia and raised primarily in Connecticut; after adopting the classical clarinet at age nine, he moved to the saxophone as a teen, later studying composition and arranging at Boston's Berklee College of Music. A protege of Joe Henderson and Eddie Daniels, Meadows later served a long stint as a member of Norman Connors' Starship Orchestra; after a series of session dates and sideman gigs, he made his solo debut in 1990 with the RCA release For Lovers Only, followed in 1992 by Keep It Right There. Resurfacing two years later with Forbidden Fruit, after 1995's Body Rhythm Meadows jumped to Discovery to issue 1997's Pleasure. Another Side of Midnight followed in 1999.

 

Parking information:

Please stricktly observe all NO PARKING signs.  We want everyone to leave with a smile!

http://www.branfordjazz.com/directions.php

Cancellations or Delays

Show cancellations, delays, etc. will be made here:

http://branfordjazz.com//whats-new.php#80

 if we must cancel or postpone for any reason.  Please check back often if you're concerned.  We can do a live update from the green if needed. Canceled shows are not rescheduled.  The canceled band or performer is asked to return the following season if they are available.
item.how_to_find_us: Will fly the bw scarf with piano keys on a pole and black & white balloons.
item.name: It's HOT! It's SMOOTH! It's COOOL!......Marion Meadows
